SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, billing_date, soc_type, account_status, billable_count, carrier_count, discrepancy, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, afa_enroll_recon_discrep_id FROM elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep WHERE afa_enroll_recon_discrep_id = :afa_enroll_recon_discrep_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: --select billing_date,soc_type,account_status,billable_count,carrier_count,discrepancy from elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep --where dealer_id = :dealer_id ----dynamic_where_clause --and account_status = 'ACTIVE' --order by billing_date,account_status asc
SQL.LOAD_PHP_RECON_DATA: select billing_date,soc_type,account_status,billable_count,carrier_count,discrepancy from elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep where dealer_id = :dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause and nvl(account_status,'NO') = 'ACTIVE' UNION ALL select billing_date,soc_type,account_status,billable_count,carrier_count,discrepancy from elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep where dealer_id = :dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause and nvl(account_status,'NO') != 'ACTIVE' order by billing_date asc,soc_type desc,account_status asc
SQL.LOAD_PHP_RECON_DATA_DISCREP_ONLY: select billing_date,soc_type,account_status,billable_count,carrier_count,discrepancy from elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep where dealer_id = :dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause and nvl(account_status,'NO') = 'ACTIVE' and discrepancy = 'Y' UNION ALL select billing_date,soc_type,account_status,billable_count,carrier_count,discrepancy from elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep where dealer_id = :dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause and nvl(account_status,'NO') != 'ACTIVE' and discrepancy = 'Y' order by billing_date asc,soc_type desc,account_status asc
SQL.LOAD_MHP_RECON_DATA: select billing_date,soc_type,account_status,billable_count,carrier_count,billable_amount,carrier_amount,discrepancy from elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep where dealer_id = :dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause order by billing_date asc, decode(soc_type, 'NY Subscribers', 1, 'Non-NY Subscribers', 2, 5), decode(account_status,'Enrolled', 1, 'Billable/Enrolled', 1,'DeEnrolled', 2,'Buyers Remorse Count',3,'Deenrolled TAC Code Adjustment',4,'DeEnrolled TAC Code Adjustment',4,'Stand Alone Enrolled',5,'Stand Alone DeEnrolled',6)
SQL.LOAD_MHP_RECON_DATA_DISCREP_ONLY: select billing_date,soc_type,account_status,billable_count,carrier_count,billable_amount,carrier_amount,discrepancy from elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep where dealer_id = :dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause and discrepancy = 'Y' order by billing_date asc, decode(soc_type, 'NY Subscribers', 1, 'Non-NY Subscribers', 2, 5), decode(account_status,'Enrolled', 1, 'Billable/Enrolled', 1,'DeEnrolled', 2,'Buyers Remorse Count',3,'Deenrolled TAC Code Adjustment',4,'DeEnrolled TAC Code Adjustment',4,'Stand Alone Enrolled',5,'Stand Alone DeEnrolled',6)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, billing_date = :billing_date, soc_type = :soc_type, account_status = :account_status, billable_count = :billable_count, carrier_count = :carrier_count, discrepancy = :discrepancy, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE afa_enroll_recon_discrep_id = :afa_enroll_recon_discrep_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_afa_enroll_recon_discrep ( dealer_id, billing_date, soc_type, account_status, billable_count, carrier_count, discrepancy, created_by, afa_enroll_recon_discrep_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :billing_date, :soc_type, :account_status, :billable_count, :carrier_count, :discrepancy, :created_by, :afa_enroll_recon_discrep_id )
